item.title: 阿丽亚娜-格兰德（Ariana Grande）的祖母正在《公告牌》排行榜上创造历史。98 岁的玛乔丽-格兰德（Marjorie Grande），又名 "Nonna"，由于在孙女的新歌《平凡的事》（"ordinary things"）中演唱，成为《公告牌》Hot 100 排行榜上最年长的人。
item.description:
Ariana Grande's grandmother is making history on the Billboard charts.

At 98, Marjorie Grande, aka "Nonna," has become the oldest person to appear on the Billboard Hot 100 chart, thanks to her feature on her granddaughter's new song, "ordinary things." https://t.co/x6pdbig35I pic.twitter.com/o3YMbi9Tin

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 美国最大的医疗服务提供商之一联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group）首席执行官本周早些时候表示，该公司正在从美国历史上最严重的医疗系统网络攻击事件中恢复过来，并取得了进展。
item.description:
The UnitedHealth Group — one of the nation’s largest health care providers — said it is making progress in its recovery from one of the worst cyberattacks on a health care system in U.S. history, its CEO said earlier this week.https://t.co/1umtj0N4Y1

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 周二，梅拉尼娅-特朗普（Melania Trump）与前总统特朗普一起来到棕榈滩的一个投票站--这是她在本选举周期内罕见的公开露面。当被问及她是否会与丈夫一起参加竞选活动时，这位前第一夫人微笑着说："敬请期待。
item.description:
Melania Trump joined former Pres. Trump at a polling place in Palm Beach on Tuesday — making a rare public appearance this election cycle.

Asked if she'd be joining her husband on the campaign trail, the former first lady smiled and said, "stay tuned." https://t.co/33hPE0w9U3 pic.twitter.com/w2anWg4jGm

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024
